bioAsHtml: Dreamer about the future and Developer Advocate. Working to improve developers life. Co-Founder of ated4kids.ch, a non-profit group organizing Devoxx4Kids events in Ticino.

acceptedTalks.title: Making Events for local dev Communities

bio:
Dreamer about the future and Developer Advocate. Working to improve developers life.
Co-Founder of ated4kids.ch, a non-profit group organizing Devoxx4Kids events in Ticino.
